SEARCH
Package core

Class Payment

java.lang.Object
core.Payment
public class Payment extends Object
Represents a payment made by a student. This class follows the Single Responsibility Principle (SRP).

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    Payment(String paymentId, String studentId, double amount, String paymentMethod)
    Constructs a new Payment with the specified payment ID, student ID, amount, and payment method.

  • Constructor Details

    • Payment

      public Payment(String paymentId, String studentId, double amount, String paymentMethod)
      Constructs a new Payment with the specified payment ID, student ID, amount, and payment method.
      Parameters:
      paymentId - the unique identifier for the payment
      studentId - the unique identifier for the student making the payment
      amount - the amount of the payment
      paymentMethod - the method of payment (e.g., "CARD", "BANK", "MOBILE")
